# Como "desenhar" gráficos em ggplot


::: {.cell hash='aula4_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_c5345b2d3b2e563d6402d8173e48b655'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

mg <- read.csv("dados-diversos.csv")

mg |> 
  ggplot(aes(Irrigation, severity, shape = Irrigation)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, severity, shape = Irrigation)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)+ geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |> 
  filter(rep==1) |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, severity, shape = Irrigation)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)+ geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |>
# filter(rep ==1) |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, severity, shape = Irrigation)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)+ geom_line() + facet_wrap(~rep)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#ou

mg |>
# filter(rep ==3) |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, severity, shape = Irrigation)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)+ geom_line() + facet_wrap(~rep)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |> 
  select(Irrigation, severity) |>  
  ggplot(aes(Irrigation, severity)) + geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point() + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |> 
  select(day, rep, severity) |>  
  ggplot(aes(day, severity,)) + geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mg |> 
  select(day, rep, severity) |>  
  group_by(day) |> 
  summarize(sev = mean(severity)) |> 
    ggplot(aes(day, sev,)) + geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-8.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#fazendo a media 
mg2 <- mg |> 
  select(day, rep, severity) |>  
  group_by(day) |> 
  summarize(sev = mean(severity))

mg2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, sev*100))+
  geom_line(color = "darkorange")+
  geom_point(size = 3, 
             color = "darkorange")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0,7,14,21,28,35,42,49,56,63))+
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 5, 
                     limits = c(0,100))+
    labs(x = "Time (days)", 
         y = "Severity (%)", 
         title = "My first ggplot", 
         subtitle = "It is beatiful", 
         caption = "Source: FIP 606")+
#   Configurar o gráfico
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-9.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("myfirstggplot.png",
       bg = "white",
       width = 4,
       height = 3)
```
:::
